data.title: Healthy Workplaces - Safe and healthy work in the digital age 2023-2025
data.text:
SAP SE

Organisation Type Private Company

Bussines sector Professional, scientific and technical activities

Mission Statement

SAP’s purpose is to help the world run better and improve people’s lives. We help customers transform into fully digital, resilient, and sustainable enterprises – companies enabled with data visibility into their business functions and processes to make the most critical strategic and operating decisions.

To deliver on our promises outlined in SAP’s Business Strategy, our people need to run at their

best, utilizing their full potential while caring for their own health, their colleagues’ and team’s well-being and their customers’ needs. Health, safety, and well-being are cornerstones of a sustainable future of work. For more information please see SAP Health & Safety Commitment Statement, https://www.sap.com/documents/2023/02/f6fcfebb-5f7e-0010-bca6-c68f7e60039b.html.

Our campaign pledge

Through our wide network and external interest in our company, we expect a positive interest in SAP’s involvement in this campaign. We plan to proactively contribute to the “Safe and healthy work in the digital age” campaign by the following:

• Contribute to campaign events and Good Practice Exchange events with official campaign partners

• Exchange best practices with other campaign partners and EU-OSHA networks

• Increase awareness of the campaign in SAP external media content via SAP social media accounts

• Promote our campaign partner status in our networks

• Leverage EU-OSHA campaign supporting material internally to raise awareness of the business case of a healthy workplace

• Submit entry to the Healthy Workplaces Good Practice Award

Christian KLEIN

CEO

SAP’s winning culture future-proofs our business in the digital age. By caring for our people, we create the foundation for them to thrive and succeed in the future of work – healthy, safe, and balanced.
